name: CopilotCodeReview
description: Perform automated code reviews on pull requests using the official GitHub Copilot CLI
author: LittleFortSoftware

inputs.name: githubPat
inputs.label: GitHub PAT
inputs.helpMarkDown: Personal Access Token for GitHub with Copilot access. This token is used to authenticate with the GitHub Copilot CLI.

inputs.name: azureDevOpsPat
inputs.label: Azure DevOps PAT
inputs.helpMarkDown: Personal Access Token for Azure DevOps. Used for retrieving pull request details and posting review comments.

inputs.name: organization
inputs.label: Organization
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Azure DevOps organization name (e.g., 'myorg' from https://dev.azure.com/myorg). If not specified, will be automatically detected from the pipeline context.

inputs.name: project
inputs.label: Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Azure DevOps project name. Defaults to $(System.TeamProject).

inputs.name: repository
inputs.label: Repository
inputs.helpMarkDown: The repository name where the pull request exists. Defaults to $(Build.Repository.Name).

inputs.name: pullRequestId
inputs.label: Pull Request ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID of the pull request to review. If not specified, defaults to $(System.PullRequest.PullRequestId) when run as part of a PR validation build.

inputs.name: timeout
inputs.label: Timeout (minutes)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The maximum number of minutes to allow the Copilot review to run before timing out. Default is 15 minutes.

inputs.name: model
inputs.label: Copilot Model
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional. The Copilot model to use for the review (e.g., 'gpt-4', 'claude-sonnet'). If not specified, uses the default model.

inputs.name: promptFile
inputs.label: Custom Prompt File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional. Path to a .txt file containing a custom prompt for Copilot. The file must exist and contain content.

inputs.name: prompt
inputs.label: Custom Prompt
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional. A custom prompt to pass directly to Copilot. If both prompt and promptFile are specified, prompt takes precedence.

inputs.name: authors
inputs.label: Author Filter
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional. A comma-separated list of email addresses. If specified, the task will only run code reviews for PRs authored by users with matching email addresses. Uses $(Build.RequestedForEmail) for comparison.
